title: Gold Main Support Looking For Clash Team

embed.title: Surryasha (EUW) - LeagueOfGraphs
embed.description: Gold III - Wins: 78 (54.5%) (#2,002,391) / Lulu: Wins: 58.2% - Played: 122 (#3,925) / Janna: Wins: 37.5% - Played: 8 / Leona: Wins: 60.0% - Played: 5

body:
Hello dear lol community,

this is Surryasha, and I am a main Support. This season I carried a lot of games as a Support, mainly playing my all-time best Lulu. I can play various champions as a Support. With this post I am offering my services to a Clash-team that looks for a Support to make their team full. I know that most probably my Lulu will be banned, but do not worry. I can play a lot of Supports. My strenghts are my team-oriented gameplay, i.e. keeping a high vision score and my wards up, always playing for the team (flashing for a heal or ult for my carries). My weaknesses could be that I rather outplay opponents by abusing their mistakes than to create plays to outplay them. And I do not like using Discord when playing League. To my opinion, I know very well what to do in what situation (dis-engage, roaming, objectives, warding) and talking and explaining my further moves rather keep me slow and distracted from the game as well as my teammates. Also there is no fixed playstyle to me. Though I like abusing enemies weaknesses, I do recognize when to take advantage and make plays aggressively. 

If you have interest in completing your Clash-Team for next week Saturday, 14th March 2020, feel free to add me ingame. 

-Surryasha
 "former rank 49 EUW Lulu"
